response.overview: "The first short movie I ever starred in. I'm DINNER. The rest of the cast is my Uncle Mike, and Brother Brian. Mike continues to write and act. And I continue to film and do stupid things on camera. This was made about 1984. Having a video camera and a light was amazing. Took 1 to hold the vcr thing, 1 to hold the light and 1 to hold the camera!  I'm in the process of trying to organize a re-boot of this movie. But finding people hasn't gone well. Will keep trying." â€“Gregg Cerenzio
response.title: Wharton Thriller
